data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Munari, Lorenzo (2008): Studies on the Canacidae (Diptera), subfamily Apetaeninae. II. A review of the world subgenera of Apetaenus Eaton, with a special reference to the Australian and New Zealand species. Zootaxa 1692: 26-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180627
